name: yandex
description: Yandex is a Russian internet services provider offering search, email, navigation, and other web-based solutions, often referred to as “Russia’s Google”

tools.name: YANDEX_GEOCODER_REVERSE
tools.description: Tool to perform reverse geocoding using Yandex Maps HTTP Geocoder API.

kind.title: Kind
kind.description: Type of object to return, e.g., 'house'

lang.title: Lang
lang.description: Language and region for the response, e.g., 'en_US'

apikey.title: Apikey
apikey.description: Yandex Maps HTTP Geocoder API key

tools.name: YANDEX_ORGANIZATION_SEARCH
tools.description: Tool to find businesses and organizations by name, address, or TIN. Use when you need to search for companies in a specific region or text query.

ll.title: Ll
ll.description: Longitude,latitude of search center. Used with spn or bbox to bound search area.

spn.title: Spn
spn.description: Longitude span,latitude span for search area. Used with ll.

uri.title: Uri
uri.description: Identifier from previous geosuggest result. If set, text is ignored.

bbox.title: Bbox
bbox.description: Bounding box as 'lon1,lat1~lon2,lat2'. Overrides ll+spn if provided.

lang.title: Lang
lang.description: Preferred response language and regional settings in format language_region. Supported: ru_RU, uk_UA, be_BY, en_RU, en_US, tr_TR.

rspn.title: Rspn
rspn.description: Restrict search to defined area (ll+spn or bbox). True to restrict, False to allow outside search.

skip.title: Skip
skip.description: Number of results to skip. Must be a multiple of `results` if > 0.

text.title: Text
text.description: Search query text: business name, address, TIN, coordinates, or phone number.

type.title: Type
type.description: Type of search results; fixed to 'biz' for organization search.

apikey.title: Apikey
apikey.description: API key issued in the Yandex Developer Dashboard for Places API. Activation takes up to 15 minutes.

results.title: Results
results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-50). Default is 10.

tools.name: YANDEX_ROUTE
tools.description: Tool to generate detailed route for driving, walking, or public transport. Use when planning a route between specified geographic points.

inputSchema.title: YandexRouteRequest

apikey.title: Apikey
apikey.description: Yandex Maps API key. Activation may take up to 15 minutes.

levels.title: Levels
levels.description: Comma-separated floor levels per waypoint (must match number of waypoints). Available for walking and transit modes on paid plans.

payload.title: Payload
payload.description: Vehicle load capacity in tons (truck only).

traffic.title: Traffic
traffic.description: Disable traffic-aware routing (only for driving or truck modes).

waypoints.title: Waypoints
waypoints.description: Route waypoints in WGS84 'latitude,longitude' format separated by '|'. Use up to 50 points for driving/truck modes, and up to 25 for other modes.

max_weight.title: Max Weight
max_weight.description: Maximum allowed vehicle weight in tons (truck only).

avoid_tolls.title: Avoid Tolls
avoid_tolls.description: Avoid toll roads (only for driving or truck modes).

avoid_zones.title: Avoid Zones
avoid_zones.description: Polygons to avoid during routing, each formatted as 'lat,lon|lat,lon|...'. Only for driving or truck modes.

axle_weight.title: Axle Weight
axle_weight.description: Vehicle axle load in tons (truck only).

has_trailer.title: Has Trailer
has_trailer.description: Indicates if the vehicle has a trailer (truck only).

departure_time.title: Departure Time
departure_time.description: Departure time as UNIX timestamp in seconds. Ignored for walking, bicycle, or scooter modes, or when traffic is disabled.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for building a route using Yandex Routing API.

tools.name: YANDEX_TILES
tools.description: Tool to fetch individual map tile images by x/y coordinates and zoom level. Use after calculating tile indices for custom map rendering.

l.title: L
l.description: Map layer type. Only 'map' (roadmap) is supported.

x.title: X
x.description: Tile number on the X axis (calculate per docs).

y.title: Y
y.description: Tile number on the Y axis (calculate per docs).

z.title: Z
z.description: Zoom level, integer from 0 (whole world) up to 20 (street level).

lang.title: Lang
lang.description: Map caption language and region, in ISO 639-1_language + ISO 3166-1_region format. Determines feature-label language and regional settings.

scale.title: Scale
scale.description: Scale factor for tile image size (0.11.0). Values >1.0 produce larger hi-res tiles (51212 for scale=2), values <1.0 shrink the tile.

apikey.title: Apikey
apikey.description: Developer API key issued in the Yandex Developer Dashboard. Activation may take up to 15 minutes.

projection.title: Projection
projection.description: Projection: 'wgs84_mercator' for elliptical Mercator (default), 'web_mercator' for spherical Web Mercator.
